unnormalised: Hey everyone! Training regimens are intense, right? Like, think Virat Kohli's dedication! I heard his gym alone is like 5000 sq ft! Dr. Sharma at NIS Patiala probably has some amazing insights. Wondering if running 5 km every morning like Milkha Singh is still effective. Also, what Rs. are we talking for personal training these days? Need to prepare for my upcoming kabaddi match. Any tips appreciated!
